metas.name: GIRLS BAND CRY: Seishun Kyousoukyoku
metas.description: Genres: Drama, Music, Slice of Life Tags:Band/Female Protagonist/Rock Music Compilation film of GIRLS BAND CRY. The first of the GBC compilation movie duology.

metas.name: 100 METERS
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Sports Tags:Rotoscoping/Coming of Age/Athletics/Male Protagonist/Shounen 100 METERS follows Togashi, a track star who is born to run. As a kid, he is naturally gifted and wins every 100-meter race without effort. But in sixth grade, he meets Komiya, a transfer student who is full of determination but lacks technique. In teaching him, Togashi gives Komiya a new purpose: to win no matter what. Years pass by, and Togashi and Komiya meet again as rivals on the track and reveal their true selves.

(Source: GKIDS)

metas.name: Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai: Kanketsu-hen 2
metas.description: Genres: Music, Slice of Life Tags:Idol The second in the trilogy of Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai films that continues the story beyond season two and the OVA.

metas.name: Peleliu: Rakuen no Guernica
metas.description:
Genres: Drama Tags:Historical/War Anime adaptation of Kazuyoshi Takeda's Peleliu: Rakuen no Guernica manga.

The story follows the daily lives of Japanese soldiers taking part in the Battle of Peleliu during World War II: a high-casualty, months-long campaign. The main character, Tamaru, dreams of returning home to become a mangaka, and sees their island outpost as a wild paradise that can one day be used as a setting for one of his stories. Most of his comrades, however, are prepared for the more realistic scenario - that they will not be leaving Peleliu alive.
